Package info.michaelkohler.helpertools

HelperTools is a library which provides different Java classes with the goal to provide easy-to-use methods for Java developers.

You can download the latest version (0.0.1) here.

If you have any questions, please feel free to write an email. If you found a bug, please report it here. You can find the code on github.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CSVExporter
    The |CSVExporter| can be used to export different data into a CSV file.
    Debugger
    The |Debugger| can be use as a simple Exception logger.
    FileReader
    The |FileReader| is responsible to read the content of a whole file.
    FileWriter
    A |FileWriter| writes data to a file.
    PropertiesHelper
    The |PropertiesHelper| is a full API for Java's Properties.
